mapper.select: SELECT b.bookId, u.userName AS userName, bs.name AS ticketName, bs.ticketType AS ticketType, bs.description AS description, b.status as status, b.usedDt AS usedDt FROM book b JOIN Users u ON b.userId = u.userId JOIN seatprice sp ON b.seatId = sp.seatPriceId JOIN book_show bs ON sp.ticketId = bs.ticketId WHERE 1=1 AND b.usedDt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND u.userId = #{userId}
SELECT ticketId , placeId , placeName , ticketName , description , ticketType , homeTeam , homeTeamLogo , awayTeam , awayTeamLogo , startDate , openDate FROM book_show WHERE 1=1

SELECT bs.ticketId, bs.ticketName, bs.startDate, bs.homeTeamLogo , p.placeId, p.placeName, p.address, p.seatZone, p.seatRow, p.seatCol FROM book_show bs LEFT JOIN place p on bs.placeId = p.placeId WHERE p.placeId = #{placeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seatprice(ticketId, placeId, price, status, seatZone, seatRow, seatCol) VALUES(#{ticketId}, #{placeId}, #{price}, 'available', #{seatZone}, #{seatRow}, #{seatCol});
